name: Find the Floppas: Floppidex
description:
This is a small project based on a game I am working on called "Find the Floppas". When it is closer to completion I will add an Itch release, but for now play it here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/579862290

This was made for fun, and is not yet finished. Note there is no Floppa descriptions yet. The original game has a bad built in version of this, however.

Press space to continue.
